E.Security Alarm Systems Inc. is a state licensed and insured, low voltage and security systems solutions provider in South Florida. We operate primarily in Miami-Dade, Broward and West Palm Beach counties since 2007, expanded our services. We provide unmatched security systems solutions to meet the needs of thousands of residential and commercial customers. We also provide installation and service performance for M&S Intercom systems, CCTV surveillance systems, Personal reporting system and personal self defense products along with specific self defense techniques in order to minimize or avoid a potentially threatening or deadly situation.

Thatâ€™s why we offer customized security plans to protect your home and family in all the ways that matter to you. Residential Security System: We provide service, installation and central station monitoring services for all Honeywell and ademco security systems. Residential Music and Sound Intercom systems: We provide new installation, service and upgrade of new and existing intercom systems. We can upgrade your nutone or M&S intercom system to a state of the art MSDMC 3-4 Intercom and communication center. Residential CCTV Cameras systems: We provide installation and maintenance of all brands CCTV cameras systems including Digital video recorders and remote viewing capabilities. Residential Personal Emergency Reporting Systems: We provide you with complete peace of mind by installing a PERS Unit which comes with a water proof pendant or wrist watch to take with you where ever you go and gives you the peace of mind of knowing help is only the press of a button away from your unit.
